description:
# Document name - AWS-UpdateALBDesyncMitigationMode

## What does this document do?
The AWS-UpdateALBDesyncMitigationMode runbook will update the desync mitigation mode on an Application Load Balancer
(ALB) to the specified mitigation mode using
[ModifyLoadBalancerAttributes](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/elasticloadbalancing/latest/APIReference/API_ModifyLoadBalancerAttributes.html)
API. The desync mitigation mode determines how the load balancer handles requests that might pose a
security risk to your application.

## Input Parameters
* AutomationAssumeRole: (Optional) The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) role
  that allows Systems Manager Automation to perform the actions on your behalf. If no role is specified,
  Systems Manager Automation uses the permissions of the user that starts this runbook.
  * Default: ""
* LoadBalancerArn: (Required) The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the load balancer that you want to modify the
  desync mitigation mode.
* DesyncMitigationMode: (Required) The mode that the Application Load Balancer will operate in.  For information about
  the desync mitigation modes, see
  [Desync mitigation modes](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/elasticloadbalancing/latest/application/application-load-balancers.html#desync-mitigation-mode)
  documentation.
